product_overview: STC AI-VAP Platform is a comprehensive SaaS solution for AI-powered video analysis, featuring real-time camera monitoring, alerts, analytics, and extensive administration controls with robust authentication and role-based access control mechanisms.
core_goals: Provide secure and seamless user authentication and session management.
Implement strict role-based access control ensuring proper permission enforcement across all user roles.
Enable smooth navigation across platform modules including dashboards, live views, camera and alert management.
Ensure robust error handling to gracefully manage unauthorized access, invalid routes, and network issues.
Deliver comprehensive management features for organizations, teams, users, devices, and AI modules.
Support scalable system management for super admins including monitoring, backups, and licensing.
key_features: Robust Authentication System with login, logout, password reset, and session persistence.
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) supporting multiple user roles from viewer to super admin with tailored permissions.
Dynamic and responsive Dashboard presenting real-time statistics, charts, and activity summaries.
Comprehensive Camera Management including CRUD, live view, snapshots, and server configuration.
Alerts System with filtering, status updates, real-time notifications, and export capabilities.
Analytics Module offering detailed insights, trends, and report generation.
People and Vehicle Management with face recognition and plate recognition capabilities.
Attendance Tracking with check-in/out and report filtering.
Market and Automation Modules for event management and AI-driven automation rules.
Full Team and Organization Management with subscription plans and roles.
Extensive Admin Console for super admins managing organizations, users, licenses, edge servers, AI modules, plans, integrations, SMS settings, notifications, system updates, and backups.
Platform Branding and Wording customization to reflect organizational identity.
Integrated global Toast Notification system and dynamic theming with Branding Context.
user_flow_summary: User navigates to the login page, authenticates successfully, and is redirected based on role (Super Admin to /admin, others to /dashboard).
Authenticated users access various modules via sidebar navigation appropriate to their roles.
Super Admin accesses administrative routes for managing organizations, users, licenses, and system settings.
Users interact with dashboard widgets displaying real-time data, navigate to live video feeds and manage cameras, alerts, people, vehicles, and attendance.
Users encounter appropriate error messages upon unauthorized access attempts or navigation to invalid routes.
Session persistence ensures users remain logged in after page reloads, with secured session termination via logout.
Admin users manage AI modules configuration, model training, integrations, and automation rules from dedicated sections.
System administrators perform backups, monitor system health, and manage platform settings and updates through admin interfaces.
validation_criteria: Successful login and logout flows for all roles with secure session handling.
Role-based access control enforcing correct permissions; super admin full access; regular users restricted accordingly.
Navigation flows allow seamless page transitions and correct sidebar/menu visibility per role.
Error handling displays user-friendly messages for unauthorized access, network errors, and invalid routes.
All critical APIs respond correctly, enabling CRUD operations on cameras, alerts, people, vehicles, and team management.
Real-time updates and notifications function reliably across all modules.
System management interfaces allow creation, modification, and deletion of organizations, licenses, users, and edge servers.
AI modules and automation rules can be configured, executed, and logged properly.
Platform branding and wording customization updates reflect immediately across the UI.
Automated tests achieve expected success rates (75-100%) post-release deployments, confirming system stability and correctness.
